name: Honk! Honk!
description:
Honk! Honk! is the fine line between the simulation and arcade racer genres.

Play as a maniacal bus driver who will stop at nothing to bring his passengers to their destination, making the 8 hours of his work worth every penny.

While mobility if of the future, recklesness stays the same.

Credits

| Sergiusz Stein | Bryan Lobo | Simon Persson | Teddy Molin | Sarah Lindahl | Prateek Karajgikar | Patryk Wirkin | Tobias Bellander |
